stems.BSC: (to be) an animal identified as **(Neobatrachians [other than Bufonids] and Mesobatrachians; numerous genera) frog**, as a holistic entity, including its physical/corporeal body and its and mental identity and living essence; to live/be alive (as an animal of such kind)
stems.CTE: (to be) that which gives a particular animal identified as **(Neobatrachians [other than Bufonids] and Mesobatrachians; numerous genera) frog** its individual identity; the living essence or mental identity of an animal of such kind
stems.CSV: (to be) the physical body of an animal identified as **(Neobatrachians [other than Bufonids] and Mesobatrachians; numerous genera) frog**; the corporeal aspect of an animal of such kind
stems.OBJ: (to be) an activity engaged in by an animal identified as **(Neobatrachians [other than Bufonids] and Mesobatrachians; numerous genera) frog**; what an animal of such kind is doing; to act (as a particular animal species of such kind does)
